title: Episode 992 - Special Guest Jack Carr
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Former Navy SEAL and bestselling author Jack Carr joins the show to talk about ‘The Terminal List’, the new TV show directed by Antoine Fuqua and starring Chris Pratt, and based on his novel of the same name. Plus what he thinks of Russia’s invasion of A...
itunes:summary:
Former Navy SEAL and bestselling author Jack Carr joins the show to talk about ‘The Terminal List’, the new TV show directed by Antoine Fuqua and starring Chris Pratt, and based on his novel of the same name. Plus what he thinks of Russia’s invasion of Afghanistan and Biden’s State of the Union.
